amendment.description: An amendment to the Funderburk amendment to reduce the authorization for salaries and expenses of the State Department by approximately $17.7 million.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Funderburk to the Brownback amendment (A001).
Funderburk amendment (A003) modified by unanimous consent. Strike "for the fiscal year 1996" both places it appears.
By unanimous consent, the Funderburk amendment was withdrawn.
